alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nolan and southern Fisher Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gannon, or near Roscoe, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Roscoe, Roby, Sylvester, Wastella, Longworth, Gannon, Busby, Capitola, Us-84 Near The Nolan-Fisher County Line and I- 20 Near The Nolan-Mitchell County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 229 and 254. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
